about_the_game:
Build Your Space Station Bar

My Space Bar is a restaurant and attractions simulator where you build and manage a space station bar!



Expand your station. Build a dining area with tables, lights, and décor. Build a kitchen and hire staff. Make your space bar even more special by adding dance clubs, arcades, and more. The happier your customers are, the more space bucks they will spend!

Build Your Station


Customize your space station using different kinds of floors and walls. Will you go with a space age look, or perhaps something more cozy? It’s up to you! How you build your station matters. Tables near windows and good lighting are more appealing than those near a noisy generator. The better ambiance you provide the more money you will make!

Build solar panels and generators to provide power for all of the cool things in your station. Dance clubs and arcades require quite a bit of power. You’ll need to decide the best places to put the generators to avoid disturbing your patrons.

Customers will want a comfortable and well-lit place to eat. Make sure your tables are near light sources, fans to circulate fresh air, décor to beautify the area, and more.

Hire and Train Your Staff


Hire and level up staff to run the kitchen, serve the food, play music, and maintain your equipment. Each staff member has different strengths and weaknesses. A good waiter can increase the chance that a party will order dessert and a good mechanic will ensure that all of your arcade machines are in working order. And of course, doing that well means more money!

Unlock New Recipes


Start with a simple menu and then expand into more choices including dessert and specialty drinks. The more options you have, the more satisfied your customers will be.

Build Specialty Areas


Unlock and build a dance club and an arcade! The more atmosphere you add to the dance club and the more arcade machines you provide the more your customers will spend time there and of course, spend money too. Additional specialty areas will be added during development as well!

name: My Space Bar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel I5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel I7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

short_description: Manage your own space station bar! Customize your station, hire staff, improve your menu, decorate, and add attractions like arcades and dance clubs!
